caption: b'We are privileged to be able to call many hard-working people in the hospitality industry our customers and partners. This #BartenderDay, we raise a glass to all those who have helped us enjoy a beer during life\xe2\x80\x99s best moments, and sometimes its most challenging. This one\xe2\x80\x99s for you.'

b'\xe2\x80\x98Tis the season, beer lover! In today\xe2\x80\x99s edition of #Beerscovery, we\xe2\x80\x99re taking a peek at the malts behind some of our favorite winter brews. Cheers to our talented maltsters, who kiln and roast the grains that give these brews their deep flavor and darker color!'

b'#HoppyMonday from all of our breweries celebrating big anniversaries this year, including @grupomodelomx , Harbin, @thesabreweries and @cerveceriaymalteriaquilmes! Let\xe2\x80\x99s raise our glasses and toast to another 100+ years of building a better world together! :clinking_beer_mugs:'

b"Save the date! Our @100accelerator Demo Day 2020 is around the corner.\n \nJoin our CEO Carlos Brito, our Chief Procurement, Sustainability and Circular Ventures Officer Tony Milikin, our Global VP of Sustainability Ezgi Barcenas, our Global Director of the 100+ Accelerator Maisie Devine and our keynote speaker, Founder and CEO of Leaders'\xe2\x80\x8b Quest, Lindsay Levin, as we welcome startups from the second cohort to pitch on Tuesday, December 1 from 10:00AM ET - 12:00PM ET via Facebook Live. We hope to see you there!"

b'#CheersFrom Chicago this #BlackFriday! Ten years ago, a faithful few stood in line to purchase a new beer from @gooseisland\nThat beer was 2010 Bourbon County Stout Rare and the concept of waiting in line for beer was unheard of. The idea to release a very special small batch of Bourbon County Brand Stout grew to be one of the biggest beer releases in the world! While the process of purchasing this year\xe2\x80\x99s BCS lineup may be a little different to avoid waiting in crowded long lines (think lottery systems, pre-purchases, or selected pick-up time), we promise it will be worth it. Cheers to a decade of releases!'

b'Today, on #InternationalDayForEliminationOfViolenceAgainstWomen, we recognize @thesabreweries\xe2\x80\x99 Carling Black Label, the largest beer brand in South Africa, for its powerful #NOEXCUSE campaign that aims to drive behavior change and impart the message that domestic violence is never acceptable. Originally developed in 2017, the campaign continues to address the critical national issue of violence against women. This year, after the nationwide lockdown led to a spike in gender-based violence, @carlingblacklabel, along with LifeLine, expanded the initiative to include a helpline where victims could confidentially seek help through a text message.'

b'This #EspressoDay, we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating one brew with another! @elysianbrewing\xe2\x80\x98s Split Shot Espresso Milk Stout is a single hopped stout made with Magnum hops for a touch of bitterness, milk sugar for a hint of sweetness, and coffee for an invigorating richness. Cheers!'

b'Being indoors \xe2\x80\x93 for many, these past nine months \xe2\x80\x93 has sparked a growing desire to be outside and explore a lifestyle away from the familiar urban jungle and closer to nature. Today @corona is addressing this shift with the  global launch of its new original content series, Free Range Humans. The series celebrates the stories of individuals around the world who have challenged a conventional lifestyle to overcome obstacles and fully embrace their passions, ranging from underwater art sculpting to the development of an influential female surf school. To watch the series, see link in bio.'

b'#CheersFrom the safety and comfort of your own home! The Drinkworks drinkmaker is designed to transform the way you enjoy cocktails at home with just the push of a button. Check out @drinkworks to explore the full range of cocktails, brews, ciders and more!'

b'Today on #womensentrepreneurshipday we celebrate the power of women to transform the world. To the women behind our incredible @100accelerator ventures, and to all women entrepreneurs, we celebrate your ideas, passion and work to make the world a better place for the next 100+ years! :clinking_beer_mugs:'

b'What brings people together, uses water, grain and yeast, was first made around 7000 BC, and has been universally enjoyed since then? If you answered beer, you would be correct, but if you answered bread, you would be correct as well! Today in honor of #HomemadeBreadDay, we celebrate the long, intertwined history of beer and bread with 5 delicious recipes that definitely \xe2\x80\x98rise\xe2\x80\x99 to the occasion. Link in bio for more!'

b'As one of the largest truck fleets in the world, it is our duty to lead by example and spearhead #RoadSafety from within. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we are proud to partner with Together for Safer Roads, PepsiCo and Republic Services to launch the Truck of the Future Initiative. As part of this initiative, we are collaborating with UPS, the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services, and experts from leading truck safety research agencies to test innovative and cost-effective solutions that  eliminate collisions between large vehicle operators and other road users, especially the most vulnerable.'

b'#CheersFrom Argentina, where @cervezapatagonia recently launched the country\xe2\x80\x99s first organic beer. Sendero Sur is a limited edition beer where each link in the production process has been certified organic: from the cultivation of barley in the field, through its malting to the production of beer. And on top of that, sales of Sendero Sur help to preserve Patagonian forests! :beer_mug::seedling:'

b'#HoppyMonday from Paradise! As one way to help support the tourism industry in Colombia during the COVID-19 pandemic, @corona created #ParadiseAdvisor, a platform showcasing eco-friendly accommodation across the country to encourage local sustainable travel. \xe2\x80\x9cWe seek to give greater visibility and reputation to these places, which promote the efficient use of natural resources and support to local communities through practices and innovations oriented to the sustainable economy of the region,\xe2\x80\x9d said Diego Pomareda, director of Corona in Colombia. For more, check out @paradise.advisor'
b'Beer lovers looking for their next hobby, today is your day! Happy #Learntohomebrewday.\nFor tips, tricks and stories from some of our very own homebrewing legends, click the link in bio.'
b'No matter where in the world you are celebrating #NachosDay from, we\xe2\x80\x99ve got a beer for that. Pair the ultimate crunchy, cheesy dish with your favorite brew and enjoy!'

b'Today on #StoutDay, we celebrate 300+ years with this dark, heavily fermented style of beer. Did you know this beer style is primarily made with unmalted roasted barley? That\xe2\x80\x99s where the strong and robust flavor comes from! What\xe2\x80\x99s your favorite stout?'

b'This year, you can join one of the biggest marathons in the world from wherever you are! Cheers to those who are planning to join runners from around the globe for the virtual 26.2-mile #NYCMarathon this weekend, especially those #TeamUltra athletes who have trained hard, always go the extra mile and know that one of the best parts of finishing a race is the reward of enjoying a @michelobultra'
b'Hoppy #Halloween! It\xe2\x80\x99s spooky season, and even these scary creatures have picked their favorite brews. Which one is your favorite? :jack-o-lantern: :ghost::beer_mug:'

b'If you find yourself celebrating #Halloween at home this year, put your imagination to the test with these tricky treats! Don\xe2\x80\x99t forget your favorite brew for a frighteningly tasty pairing. Bone appetit!'

b'Our third quarter results reflected our ability to deliver strong results in a challenging environment due to a successful commercial strategy executed with a best-in-class brand portfolio, a relentless commitment to operational excellence driving market share gains, and confidence in the resilience of our business and the global beer category. We will leverage the fundamental strengths of our company to continue our momentum in this fast-changing environment and drive the business forward toward a strong recovery.'

b'On this World Day for #AudioVisualHeritage, we are reminded through our documentary archives of the great people that came before us. We honor their legacy so we can continue brewing the best beer for the next 100+ years!'

b'Oh my gourd, it\xe2\x80\x99s :jack-o-lantern: season! In honor of #PumpkinDay today, we are celebrating with the tasty seasonal collection from @elysianbrewing. Using only the best pumpkins in the Pacific Northwest of the United States, Elysian brews each of their four pumpkin beers - The Great Pumpkin, Dark O\xe2\x80\x99 The Moon, Punkuccino, and Night Owl - with a unique recipe and blend of spices and ingredients.'

b'Cheers to #UN75 this United Nations Day! Only together can we achieve the @unitednations #SDGs and brew a better world.

Learn how we support these #GlobalGoals at www.ab-inbev.com

#TogetherForBetter'

b'#CheersFrom San Francisco California, where @hiballenergy is based. Made from sparkling water and natural ingredients including organic coffee, organic ginseng, organic guarana and B vitamins, this beverage is a tasty and thirst-quenching energy beverage with 0 sugar and 0 calories. Have you tried it yet?'

b'Crisp, light and refreshing, #BuschLightApple is an apple-solutely delicious lager that\xe2\x80\x99s only available for a limited time. We don\xe2\x80\x99t think we could have picked a better brew to enjoy on #AppleDay :red_apple:'

b"Where do the 'crown' and the King of Beers and meet? On the @interbrand Best Global Brands 2020 Report. Congratulations @corona on being the #2 ranked beer brand only behind our very own Budweiser. Now #ThisIsLiving\n#BGB2020"

b'Today we raise a glass to the King of Beers for being the top ranked beer brand in the @interbrand Best Global Brands 2020 Report. This one\xe2\x80\x99s for you, @budweiser - Kings aren\xe2\x80\x99t made overnight!\n#BGB2020'

b'On this #InternationalGinAndTonicDay, we celebrate the innovative minds at our @cervezapatagonia microbrewery in Argentina where Gin Comunal was born by distilling beer.\nForced to throw away thousands of liters of beer in the face of COVID-19, several Argentinian breweries were on the verge of being closed forever. Instead, local Bariloche brewers gathered together with @zxventures and developed a communal gin that is now sold in Patagonia bars and at CraftSociety to support local businesses, saving 150,000 liters of beer in the process.'

b'In honor of #UNWorldFoodDay, we are highlighting Comet Bio, one of our @100accelerator startups. Comet Bio is producing healthy and sustainable products from saved grain. With their patented technology, they are creating products that are not only sustainable but also unique, by reclaiming and purifying lost nutrients and making them readily available for use in supplements, food and beverages.'
b'#CheersFrom Harbin Brewery, which is celebrating 120 years in China! To read more about the nation\xe2\x80\x99s oldest and most iconic beer brand, click the link in our bio. Ganbei!'

b"Do you know a female-founded company paving the way for a sustainable future? In partnership with @oneyoungworld #Lead2030, our @100accelerator recently announced support the challenge of #SDG5 that seeks to support female founders leading startups that addresses pressing sustainable challenges. One Young World's Lead2030 is the world's biggest prize fund for young leaders making an impact toward the #SDGs. What makes this partnership even more of a connection is that more than 70 of our own AB InBev colleagues have been One Young World ambassadors. Watch as they share why this new partnership in supporting and finding solutions that empowers women is so meaningful. Interested in applying to the Lead2030 challenge? Visit @oneyoungworld and click the link in their bio for details!"

b'Today, @budweiser announced a global partnership with multi-platinum artist @iamhalsey with the film \xe2\x80\x9cMake Your Name \xe2\x80\x93 #BeAKing,\xe2\x80\x9d an emotional story of how she found the inspiration for both her music and her stage name from the New York subway.\xe2\x80\x9cBudweiser is focused on celebrating stories of self-belief which inspire our consumers to step up and Be a King,\xe2\x80\x9d said Steve Arkley, Budweiser Global VP. \xe2\x80\x9cHalsey embodies this self-belief with an incredible true story of overcoming challenges to make her own name.\xe2\x80\x9d To watch the film, see link in bio.'

b'In honor of #DessertDay, treat yourself today with two of the best things in life: a refreshing brew and a sweet treat! Check out a few of our favorite pairings and let us know which is your favorite!'

b'#HoppyMonday from @100accelerator! Since its launch two years ago, 21 startups have raised more than 120 million dollars while working on developing businesses that are building a more sustainable and innovative world for all of us. Get to know the story behind our some of our top innovators via the link in our bio.'
b'A day to celebrate both :beer_mug:and :pizza:? Please pinch us because this seems like a dream! Which pairing will you choose to celebrate this #BeerAndPizzaDay?'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s #CanadianBeerDay! A day created to celebrate all types of Canadian beer and the people who brew it, sell it, deliver it, serve it and, of course, enjoy it! Which Canadian brew is your favorite? :Canada: :clinking_beer_mugs:'

b'#HoppyMonday from the orchard! One of our very favorite ways to mark autumn\xe2\x80\x99s arrival in the northern hemisphere is the beginning of apple harvest season. We caught up with brewmasters from @virtuecider in Fennville, Michigan and @brickworkscider in Toronto, Canada for all the juicy details on hard cider. To read more, tap the link in our bio.'

b'Cheers to #VodkaDay! Celebrate with a refreshing Vodka Mule from @cutwaterspirits The award-winning vodka is the star of this canned cocktail, holding court with invigorating ginger, bitters, and a touch of lime.'

b'Dust off your dirndl. Let out your lederhosen. It\xe2\x80\x99s Oktoberfest time! Even though the fairgrounds in Munich are empty for the first time since WWII \xe2\x80\x93 fear not \xe2\x80\x93 you can still host a virtual version of the world\xe2\x80\x99s largest beer festival. Tap into a traditional beer, like Spaten or L\xc3\xb6wenbr\xc3\xa4u, which have been part of the festival for more than a century, or try one of the Oktoberfest-inspired brews from across our portfolio. Prost! :clinking_beer_mugs:'

b'If you are a :beer_mug: & :hot_beverage:  lover, Macondo from @bbccerveceria is the perfect match for you. Celebrate #InternationalCoffeeDay with this award-wining stout ale made with 100% Colombian coffee, which has notes of toasted barley, caramel and - of course - coffee! What\xe2\x80\x99s your favorite coffee brew?'

b'A toast to #InternationalTranslationDay! No matter how you say it, \xe2\x80\x9ccheers\xe2\x80\x9d to our 170,000 brewers and brand builders in nearly 50 countries that work hard every day to bring people together \xe2\x80\x93 even at a distance \xe2\x80\x93 for a better world. #TogetherAtADistance'

b'Today, in honor of International Food Waste Awareness Day, we highlight our work with @100accelerator team @riseproductsco, a food-tech startup that specializes in collecting and converting saved grain byproducts from beer into ingredients like whole barley super flour, a superfood that is a good source of plant-based protein.\n#FLWDay #FoodWaste'

b'Hello, InstaTravelers! While our feeds have been mostly full of #throwback photos from past travels this year, today, on #WorldTourismDay, we\xe2\x80\x99re sharing some of our favorite places we can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to visit again. Which one would you like to pay a visit to? #TogetherAtADistance'

b'#CheersFrom the 75th Session of the @UnitedNations General Assembly. We celebrate a great week where we reaffirmed our commitment to work with our global and local partners towards a more sustainable future. Building a better world is a task that only can be achieved when we work together.\n#TogetherForBetter #SDGs #UNGA'

b"Today, we are proud to launch the latest #Lead2030 Challenge for #SDG5, to be delivered in partnership with our @100accelerator and @oneyoungworld.

This marks the start of a global search for the most impactful female led or female focused enterprises that are paving the way for a sustainable future. 

#TogetherForBetter #OYW #OYW2021 
\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb
#Repost @oneyoungworld
\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb
:megaphone:Just launched

@abinbev's @100accelerator & #OYW are teaming up for #Lead2030's #SDG5 challenge.

We're seeking female led companies paving the way for a sustainable future.

Winner will receive mentorship, investment & a place at #OYW2021.

Apply at the link in our bio."

b'Yesterday, our Chief Procurement, Sustainability and Circular Ventures Officer Tony Milikin joined @bloomberg Radio to discuss our 2025 #Sustainability Goals and resiliency in our supply chain. ICYMI, listen in to hear from Tony why working together is critical to making lasting impact.\n#TogetherForBetter #UNGA #GlobalGoals'

b'Brewing great beer starts with the best ingredients, which require a healthy, natural environment and thriving communities. That\xe2\x80\x99s why sustainability isn\xe2\x80\x99t just part of our business, it is our business. 
 
Through our\xe2\x80\xaf100+ Accelerator, we are partnering with great minds and unlocking innovation to support sustainable development around the world. Through our\xe2\x80\xaf2025 Sustainability goals, we are connecting thousands of farmers to technologies and skills to reduce their environmental footprint and improve their livelihoods, improving water availability and quality to communities in high-stress basins, improving recycling and circularity in partnership with our suppliers and communities, and catalyzing the transition to a low-carbon future by championing renewable electricity and reducing our carbon footprint.

#UNGA #GlobalGoals #SDGs'

b"Our CEO Carlos Brito joined @fortunemag\xe2\x80\x99s CEO Alan Murray and Editor-in-Chief Clifton Leaf on the #LeadershipNext podcast to share some ways we are helping farmers thrive and how we've offered support to retailers during the pandemic. Brito also discusses some of our efforts that earned AB InBev a spot on the 2020 Fortune #ChangeTheWorld list. He explains that 95% of our products are brewed locally from local ingredients, and then sold locally, meaning our policies have a direct impact on communities around the world. The Leadership Next podcast is available on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Fortune.com. #TogetherForBetter"

b'We are a company driven by communities, fueled by innovation and centered on consumers. We have a unique role of being a positive force in helping our communities thrive because our beers are sourced and brewed locally.\nThat\xe2\x80\x99s why we are empowering small retailers with tools to sustain their livelihoods by supporting over 400,000 small neighborhood grocers and shops with Tienda Cerca in Latin America, helping build health care facilities and emergency clinics in partnership with local governments, healthcare providers and private companies in five cities, and empowering women farmers in smallholder supply chains, so they can build sustainable futures for themselves and their families. #UNGA #GlobalGoals #SDGs'

b'Beer is a strong engine of economic activity, and we play a valuable role in supporting the recovery of those most vulnerable through our strong value chain. As a trusted partner to thousands of farmers around the globe, we work hard to improve lives. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we\xe2\x80\x99re working with farmers, big and small, to secure a more sustainable and equitable future, working with waste pickers in our recycling supply chains to improve their livelihoods, and using local crops like cassava to brew brands that generate jobs, foster the circular economy and boost smallholder agriculture.\n\n#UNGA #GlobalGoals #SDGs'

b'We want every experience with beer to be a positive one. In honor of GBRD, check out these 7 tips on how you can be a Smart Drinking champion today and every day. If you decide to drink alcohol, do it with moderation. Remember to pace your drinks, hydrate and have food while drinking. For more, please visit our website. #TogetherForBetter'

b'#CheersFrom all over the world this Global Beer Responsible Day (GBRD), as we raise together a glass of Budweiser Zero and recognize our commitment to reducing the harmful use of alcohol.\nThis zero-alcohol, zero-sugar brew has the same refreshing, full-flavored taste you expect from Budweiser, so you can enjoy 100% of the flavor and be 100% on your game. #TogetherForBetter'

b'Building a better world is a task that can only be achieved when we work together, even when we\xe2\x80\x99re at a distance. We support the @unitednations #SDGs and are committed to working with our partners towards a more sustainable future.\n#UNGA #togetherforbetter'

b'Happy #GuacamoleDay! To celebrate, we recommend pairing your favorite guacamole dish with a refreshing Bud Light Lime. Its crisp and refreshing flavor perfectly complements the spicy bitterness of guacamole! :avocado::clinking_beer_mugs:'

b'Greetings from the Enterprise! Today, we celebrate #StarTrekDay with our Elysian Space Dust, a totally nebular IPA with out-of-this-world flavor. Live long and prosper! :vulcan_salute::rocket:\n\n@elysianbrewing'

b'Attention readers: this weekend we celebrated #ReadABookDay! If you\xe2\x80\x99re planning to curl up with a good book this week, we\xe2\x80\x99re here to help. Here are a few recommended beer pairings depending on the book genre of your choice. :open_book::beer_mug:'

b'Today @Budweiser announced a long-term partnership with global football icon Lionel #Messi. "His dedication and commitment to his craft reflect the same self-belief that has led Budweiser to become the King of Beers," said our Global VP of Budweiser, Steve Arkley. The Messi edition bottle is available at select bars and retailers across India, Colombia, Argentina, Chile, China, Vietnam, Spain and Russia. #BeAKing @budfootball'

b'This week ends the induction of our new class of Global Management Trainees (GMTs), and while getting together looks a little different this year, we are thrilled to welcome these new faces to AB InBev. This year\xe2\x80\x99s class has an impressive 174 GMTs with representation from 29 countries around the world and 120+ different schools.\n \nInterested in learning more about our GMT program? Check out our website for more information. #TogetherAtADistance #ChallengeAccepted'

b'#CheersFrom Cape Town! This year, @newlands_brewery , home to the oldest commercial brewery in South Africa, celebrates 200 years of beer. In honor of its anniversary, Newlands Spring Brewery Co. created \xe2\x80\x9cThe 200,\xe2\x80\x9d a free-style ale that is an homage to the country\xe2\x80\x99s rich historical past.'

b'#CheersFrom outer space! As far-fetched as it may seem, the possibility of someday growing our ingredients and brewing our beers on another planet may be closer than you think. In fact, Budweiser, together with our Global Barley Research Center (GBRC) scientists, teamed up with NASA and @space_tango to explore growing Earth-based, natural ingredients in space and the effects of microgravity on growing and malting barley. Would you try a beer brewed in space?'

b'Happy #internationaldogday from Bud the Dalmatian! Dalmatians have served as friend and companion to the Budweiser Clydesdale team since 1950, sitting aside the driver. Did you know that Dalmatians are carriage dogs? That means they love to hang around with horses and watch out for potential dangers on the road!

:camera:: @thephodografur 
#nationaldogday'

b'#CheersFrom Colombia where we just launched Aguila 0.0: the first Colombian beer with 0.0% alcohol. Perfect for occasions such as relaxing at home, cooling off on-the-go, accompanying meals or socializing with friends. Salud!'

b'New needs demand new solutions. Do you have an idea for new products or services that can help bring people together? We want to hear from you! Share your ideas now on the Together for A Better World Platform. Link in bio. #TogetherForABetterWorld'

b"Remaining connected with friends & family has been challenging, but together we're finding ways to make it happen. Do you have a big idea that reimagines the places we hang out? Share it on the Together For A Better World Platform. Link in bio. #TogetherForABetterWorld"

b'Happy #HoneyBeeDay! Did you know that honey can be added at various points during the brewing process, from malting to just weeks before bottling? Celebrate today with Cajica\xcc\x81 Miel from @bbccerveceria - a delicious ale made with organic honey!'

b'#CheersFrom Shenzhen, where last month we celebrated the launch of Bud Light in China! The energetic and creative ceremony was broadcast through Tencent and other live streaming platforms, where more than 6 million online and offline viewers witnessed the official launch.\nGanbei! :China::clinking_beer_mugs:'

b'Finding ways to enjoy meals with friends and family while apart hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been easy, but together we\xe2\x80\x99re making it happen. Do you have a big idea on how to transform cooking and sharing meals together? Share it now on the Together For A Better World Platform. Link in bio. #TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'#HoppyMonday from the star of this socially-distant summer: hard seltzer. Hard seltzers are rapidly becoming the summer drink of choice because of their refreshing flavors. Check out our unique and varied seltzer offerings and let us know if you have a favorite!'

b'This #InternationalCatDay, we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating Louis from @boxingcatbrewery in Shanghai, China. With his joyful personality, Louis challenges the ordinary and rids the streets of mundane beers. Last summer, Louis starred in Boxing Cat\xe2\x80\x99s campaign aimed to refresh the craft beer category in China'

b'It is the heart of who we are, and the best of what we do. On this #InternationalBeerDay, we raise a glass with our colleagues around the world to toast to our number one: BEER.:clinking_beer_mugs: We want every experience with beer to be a positive one. If you decide to drink alcohol, do it with moderation. Remember to pace your drinks, hydrate and have food while drinking. For more, please visit our website. #TogetherAtADistance'

b'Keeping people entertained while at home hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been easy, but together we are making it happen. Do you have a big idea on how to keep bringing joy and fun to millions of homes around the world? Share it now on the Together For A Better World Platform. Link in bio. #TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'Have you found creative ways to take care of your well-being during these times? We want to hear from you! Share your big ideas now on the Together For A Better World Platform. Link in bio. #TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'If you need an excuse to treat yourself to a refreshing and delightful beverage\xe2\x80\xa6 Did you know that today is #WhiteWineDay?  Celebrate with BABE, a sparkling Pinot Grigio, perfect for the summer! Now available in the U.S. and the UK.\n@drinkbabe'

b'#CheersFrom Belgium, where our Belle-Vue brewers are celebrating the arrival of this season\xe2\x80\x99s cherries that are destined to become our delicious Kriek beer. Our brewers selected the cherries from the Belgian orchards themselves. After 6 months of fermentation in century old barrels, the Kriek can be tasted \xe2\x80\x93 the true cherry on top! Cheers! :cherries:'

b'Our performance in the second quarter was materially impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic, as expected. As the quarter progressed, however, we saw considerable improvement. Our company is well-positioned for a strong recovery. We have a clear commercial strategy, diverse geographic footprint, the world\xe2\x80\x99s most valuable portfolio of beer brands, industry-leading profitability, a strong team and an incredibly deep talent pool. We are inspired by the resilience of our people, our business and the global beer category.'

b'Today, @budweiserusa unveiled its first zero alcohol brew in the U.S., Budweiser Zero. Developed and co-founded in partnership with NBA legend Dwyane Wade, this zero-sugar, 50 calorie beverage has the same refreshing, full-flavored taste you can expect from Budweiser with zero percent ABV. Budweiser Zero is here for every moment that beer can be enjoyed responsibly and is creating more options for those who prefer reduced alcoholic beverages. :beer_mug:'

b'The ball is in your court. Do you have an idea on how to improve the way we experience and share our passion for sports? Share your big ideas now on the Together For A Better World Platform.\nLink in bio.\n#TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve heard of the dog days of summer, but how about the hot dog days of summer?\nJuly is #NationalHotDogMonth in the U.S. and we\xe2\x80\x99ve got just the way for you to celebrate and beat the heat. Pick your favorite toppings, get your grill going and pair it up with a cold one! What\xe2\x80\x99s your favorite combo? :hot_dog::beer_mug:'

b'As local pubs, bars and restaurants around the world were forced to close their doors, we stepped up to find ways to help. Now, even as markets reopen, there is more work to do. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we need you and your life-changing ideas. Share your big ideas now on the Together For A Better World Platform. Link in bio. #TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'We are committed to supporting our smallholder farmers through the pandemic and beyond! Our agronomist teams across the globe are rethinking ways of working and new methods of connecting with farmers that will make us more efficient and more effective as we continue to work towards achieving our 2025 goals.'

b'Our current environment is causing all of us to reevaluate what it means to be together. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we want to hear YOUR ideas on how we can collaborate to keep friends and family connected through social gatherings and special occasions while we\xe2\x80\x99re at a distance.
Visit the Together For A Better World platform and share your ideas now.
Link in bio.
#TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'#HoppyMonday from Belgium, where the breweries of Stella Artois and Hoegaarden are donating 20 million liters of water to farmers! Belgian groundwater reserves are currently low, and because water is an indispensable good for agriculture and food supply, we will be donating purified brewery water to farmers in the months of July and August.'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s Friday and it\xe2\x80\x99s also #WorldEmojiDay, so that means it\xe2\x80\x99s :SOON_arrow: :alarm_clock: :clinking_beer_mugs:. Let\xe2\x80\x99s raise a glass to being together again soon.\nLeave a cheers in the comments :backhand_index_pointing_down:\n#TogetherAtADistance'

b'Together, we were able to produce and donate more than 3 million bottles of hand sanitizer to 27 countries. If you have a big idea like this that can make our world a better place, now is your time. Link in bio to visit the Together For A Better World platform to share your ideas on how we can work together to make a difference.\n\n#TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'We believe that creativity can make the world a better place, and great ideas can come from anywhere. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we want to hear YOUR ideas on how we can collaborate to bring fun and entertainment to people\xe2\x80\x99s lives. Visit the Together For A Better World platform and share your ideas now.\n:backhand_index_pointing_right_light_skin_tone: Link in bio.\n#TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'#HoppyMonday from the U.S. \xe2\x80\x93 it may be the start of the week, but it sure feels like :french_fries:-day! In honor of #NationalFrenchFryDay in the U.S., we raise a glass (and a French Fry) in celebration, and invite fry lovers from around the world to do the same. Which one is your favorite pair?'

b'#CheersFrom Hawaii this #PinaColadaDay with our award-winning Island Colada craft beer!\nThis ale is brewed with locally sourced coconut and pineapple @konabrewingco  Did you know that this brewery has a very low carbon footprint because they use local ingredients that reduce their reliance on transportation fuel for raw materials?'

b'Nobody was ready for this crisis, but together we made a difference. Visit the Together For A Better World platform and share your ideas on how to help build a better future.\n :backhand_index_pointing_right_light_skin_tone: Link in bio\n#TogetherForABetterWorld'

b'#HoppyMonday from Shanghai, China. In honor of #InternationalKissingDay, we are sharing Budweiser\xe2\x80\x99s limited edition set of four beer bottles, designed by Norwegian designer Magnus Voll Mathiassen (MWM), from last year\xe2\x80\x99s Qixi Festival (Chinese Valentine\xe2\x80\x99s Day).\nEven if you are social distancing, we hope you can find new ways to celebrate love. #TogetherAtADistance'

b'#CheersFrom our @anheuserbusch headquarters in St Louis, Missouri! We raise a glass to all those celebrating Independence Day this weekend. This Bud\xe2\x80\x99s for USA.\n\n:camera_with_flash:: @budweiserusa'

b'Last month, we proudly entered the Top 5 of the Most Effective Marketers in the World at the #EffieAwards, taking home a total of 90 awards across our portfolio of brands, including the #1 Marketer in Latin America. Cheers, marketeers! :beer_mug:'

b'Today we celebrate Micro, Small and Medium-sized Enterprises Day by raising a glass to all of our #MSMEs around the globe. COVID-19 has impacted MSMEs in unprecedented ways. Because we are deeply connected to the communities where we live and work, we strive to be part of the solution.\nOne example is through our #TiendaCerca program, a free, online delivery platform that\xe2\x80\x99s keeping local stores open across 8 countries.'

b'#CheersFrom AB InBev to the LGBTQIA+ community. We are proud to bring together a diverse group of bold, passionate people \xe2\x80\x93 even when we\xe2\x80\x99re at a distance. #ProudToBeProud #TogetherAtADistance'

b'We are proud to launch Together for A Better World, a platform that will be rolling out globally to share unique ideas that reimagine the ways we can bring people together in areas like entertainment, social gatherings, sporting events, and more. Join us in building a better world.'
b'No matter where you are from, the feelings of gratitude and love for our fathers are the same. To all the dads out there, this one\xe2\x80\x99s for you. #fathersday'

b'The global water challenge is bigger than any individual organization and we cannot face it alone. In honor of World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought, we highlight our partners, @wwf and @nature_org, who we are working with to help communities most in need. Now more than ever, it is important that we come together to work on solutions that will benefit our communities and our people - today and for the next 100+ years.'

b'This #WorldOceansDay, we are reminded to step up and do our part to reduce marine plastic pollution. In partnership with @parley.tv, we are committed to addressing this global issue, protecting paradise and creating a better world.\n\n#Repost @corona'

b'This #WorldEnvironmentDay, we are proud of the progress we have made on our 2025 Sustainability Goals, but know there is more work to be done. We have a real opportunity to collaborate with our suppliers to design for resilience and co-invest in innovation. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we\xe2\x80\x99ve launched Eclipse \xe2\x80\x93 our new supplier collaboration platform designed to advance climate action, circular packaging, water stewardship and smart agriculture \xe2\x80\x93 at pace and at scale. For more, check out @eclipseabinbev :globe_showing_Europe-Africa:'

b'The hearts of many are broken once again by the tragedy of racial injustice. The pain, frustration and fear felt across our communities is personal - especially to our Black colleagues, consumers, and customers, in the U.S. and elsewhere. We stand with them in support of racial equality and oppose discrimination of any kind. While we don\xe2\x80\x99t have all the answers, silence is not an option. We are listening, learning, and committed to doing what\xe2\x80\x99s necessary and what\xe2\x80\x99s right. Our purpose as a company drives our actions and we will continue to work for bringing people together for a better \xe2\x80\x93 and equal \xe2\x80\x93 world.'

b'Have plans for the weekend? How about a movie night? Check out these top-notch beer and film pairings and let us know what your favorite things to watch are while enjoying a beer :clinking_beer_mugs::television: #TogetherAtADistance'

b'There\xe2\x80\x99s nothing better than enjoying a good brew while jamming out to good tunes. What\xe2\x80\x99s your favorite beer and genre combo? We\xe2\x80\x99re all ears:clinking_beer_mugs::headphone: #TogetherAtADistance'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re excited to share the launch of @budweiser Rewind, an interactive live music series that kicks off this Saturday May 16 at 8PM ET with the Black Eyed Peas, featuring their greatest hits and never-before-heard stories. To tune in globally, click the link in @budweiser\xe2\x80\x99s bio. #BEPBudRewind #TogetherAtADistance'

b'Today, the world faces an unprecedented crisis. While the full impact of the COVID-19 pandemic remains uncertain, the fundamental strengths of our company remain unchanged. We have a clear commercial strategy, diverse geographic footprint, the world\xe2\x80\x99s most valuable portfolio of beer brands, industry-leading profitability and an incredibly deep talent pool. The strong foundations we have built will help us continue to navigate this environment and carry us forward.'

b'At AB InBev, our greatest strength is \xe2\x80\x93 and always will be - our people. To our colleagues who are brewing, packing, selling, loading, delivering, and so much more: thank you. #ThisBudIsFor you.'

b'At AB InBev, we believe in bringing people together for a better world. Our purpose has never been more relevant than today. We remain focused on supporting our people, helping our communities, working with our partners, and connecting with our consumers in meaningful ways. Tap the link in bio for ongoing updates. #TogetherAtADistance'

b'In these unprecedented times, our commitment to bringing people together for a better world remains as strong as ever \xe2\x80\x93 even when we\xe2\x80\x99re at a distance. To our colleagues, our partners and our communities: we are in this together. \n#TogetherAtADistance'

b'This #WorldWaterDay, we are more committed than ever to supporting a healthy natural environment and thriving communities around the world. We remain dedicated to protecting a resource critical to the long-term resilience of our business as well as communities, economies and ecosystems around the world: water. In 2018, we committed to achieving measurable improvement in water availability and quality in 100% of our communities facing water stress. We\xe2\x80\x99re proud of our progress so far and know there is more to do.  #waterstewardship #climateresilience'

b'We have always been committed to being a part of the solution in our communities and today is no different - even in these unprecedented times. Our breweries around the world are manufacturing over 1 million bottles of hand sanitizer to donate to hospitals and frontline workers in some of the areas most impacted by COVID-19, using alcohol extracted from the brewing process of our non-alcohol beers. We are all in this together. #TogetherAtADistance #DistantTodayTogetherTomorrow'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWe decided, thanks to our colleague from Rome, to start having a beer together after work every Friday just to feel \xe2\x80\x98normal\xe2\x80\x99 again. We feel like a real FAMILY. Here in Italy we\xe2\x80\x99re facing a tough situation, especially for our economy. But my team is doing our best - as always - meeting virtually to take care of our wholesalers, bars, restaurants and retailers. It\xe2\x80\x99s not easy but we know TOGETHER WE CAN DO IT!\xe2\x80\x9d - Gianmarco Consorti, Account Manager, On Trade. #bestbeerjob #challengeaccepted #alonetogether'
b'#CheersFrom Belgium, the home of Hoegaarden! #Didyouknow that this wheat beer is fermented twice but not filtered\xe2\x80\xa6 that\xe2\x80\x99s what makes it so smooth!'

b'We are proud to be one of the Top 3 creative advertisers in the world! We believe creativity can redefine our business through branded experiences, innovation and relevant content to meet consumers\xe2\x80\x99 growing needs.'

b'Last month, @zxventures celebrated its fifth birthday! Since its inception in 2015, ZX Ventures has been nurturing, supporting, and growing the products and services of tomorrow. We can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to see what the next five years \xe2\x80\x93 and beyond! \xe2\x80\x93 will bring! :party_popper:'

b'#CheersFrom Brazil where music is essential to all aspects of life, including beer! #DidYouKnow that the song "Morena Tropicana" by Alceu Valen\xc3\xa7a not only inspired the fruity flavor of this Cervejaria Colorado beer, but also has the most amount of fruits named throughout the lyrics of one song?'

b'Last month, we opened a new Hoegaarden canning line in Belgium that can fill 90,000 cans an hour. The Hoegaarden brewery dates back to 1445 and has a rich history and a strong brand. To support the worldwide growth and success of the popular wheat beer, the new canning line at the brewery was developed so that Hoegaarden can be exported and appreciated all over the world. Belgium\xe2\x80\x99s Prime Minister, Sophie Wilmes, and Hoegaarden Brewery manager Karen Rombaut were both present at the opening.'
b'#CheersFrom the United States, where hard kombucha was born. Kombrewcha, a @zxventures backed beverage, is a delicious guilt-free drink made with organic ingredients and has an ABV of 4.4%.'

b"A frozen beer glass may look cool to sip your beer from, but in reality it's anything but! Frozen glasses can have ice crystals on the side of them that can cause foaming issues during your pour. The perfect temp for your brews? Between 40-55 degrees Fahrenheit."
b'#CheersFrom Canada, where a chef and a brewmaster gave life to the Accent series: beers especially crafted to pair your meals at home and elevate your everyday dining experience.'

b"#CheersFrom Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, home of the world's biggest party: Carnival! #CarnivalRio officially kicks off tomorrow, but you might find that the city is already bursting with Samba music. Wishing all of our Brazilian colleagues a great celebration! :clinking_beer_mugs:"
location_name: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

caption: b'#CheersFrom Argentina, the South American Wine capital. Have plans for #ValentinesDay yet? If not, here\'s something that we think you\'re going to love: Blasfemia (yes, that translates to "blasphemy" in Spanish): a delicious ready-to-enjoy fizzy wine. Cheers!'
b'Talk about staying cool under pressure: did you know that a beer cap can hold up to twice the amount of pressure as a car tire?'

b'Did you know that the term draft, or draught, comes from the Old English word \xe2\x80\x9cdragan\xe2\x80\x9d that means \xe2\x80\x9ccarry\xe2\x80\x9d or \xe2\x80\x9cpull\xe2\x80\x9d? Draft beer is usually stored in casks or steel kegs that prevent contact from sunlight and oxygen, which keeps the beer fresher, and served from a tap. What\xe2\x80\x99s your favorite beer to enjoy on draft?'

b'#HoppyMonday from Miami, Florida, home of #SuperbowlLIV! @budlight partnered with @ballcorporation and @centerplate_ to bring 50,000 recyclable aluminum cups to the big game at @hardrockstadium to tackle the use of plastic.'

b'#CheersFrom South Africa and @castlelagersa recent #OneNationOneBeer campaign. The limited edition can seen here is inspired by one of the greatest days in South African Rugby history \xe2\x80\x93 June 24, 1995. 43 million people united behind the Springboks team and erupted in elation as a drop goal scored in extra time sealed their victory and Tournament title.'
b'Filling beer bottles is a very delicate process to ensure only the freshest beer, perfectly filled in pristine bottles, reaches your hands. Cheers to that!'

b'In 2018, we committed to brew 100% of Budweiser with renewable electricity by 2025 and to engage consumers in this movement. Today, more than 50% of our purchased electricity worldwide is under renewable contracts. #wef20 #Together4Growth'
b'Our goal is for 100% of our direct farmers to be skilled, connected, and financially empowered by 2025. #wef20 #Together4Growth'

b'We are empowering over 80,000 women who run small retail stores in Colombia, Peru and Ecuador with access to business skills and financial services to improve their livelihoods. #SDGs #wef20 #Together4Growth'
b'By partnering with @banquapp, we are helping to create an economic identity for thousands of farmers in rural communities in emerging economies like Zambia and Uganda. #wef20 #Together4Growth'

b'Beer brings people together. With a long history of brewing, we know that great conversations happen when sharing a cold one. #wef20 gives us a unique opportunity to come together, share ideas and discuss how the next 10 years will be remembered for the next 100. #Together4Growth'

b'#CheersFrom @jupiler_belgium! :clinking_beer_mugs: CAN you believe this? Jupiler, along with partners Ardagh Group and Diabatix, developed a new can that keeps beer colder, for longer. Its clever \xe2\x80\x9cribbed\xe2\x80\x9d design - which disrupts the flow of air along the can body and reduces contact with your hand - is a hit with fans of our Belgian lager and earned \xe2\x80\x9cBest Can\xe2\x80\x9d honors at the 2019 World Beverage Innovation Awards.'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re striving for a world where natural resources are preserved for the future. Today, we are proud to announce our first electric truck in South Africa. The truck, called the Fuso eCanter, is helping us make progress toward a healthier environment and a low-carbon future. :bright_button:'

b'We are proud to once again participate in @salesforce\xe2\x80\x99s #MakeChangeSeries about the Future of Work. See our CEO, Carlos Brito, discuss why the future of work is exciting and why it\xe2\x80\x99s important for people to take the opportunity to build new muscles and upgrade their capabilities.'

b'#CheersFrom Peru! This new year means 366 new opportunities to try different beers. Take @cervezasanjuan for instance - an amber Pilsener lager brewed using environmentally friendly processes that reduce its carbon footprint. What brews are you most excited to try in 2020?'
b'Our favorite award is brewing your favorite beers. Cheers to the year ahead :clinking_beer_mugs::raising_hands:'
